statements: SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT footage_id, event_type FROM security_camera_footage WHERE date_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT captured_image FROM security_camera_footage WHERE event_type = 'intrusion' ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT camera_id, event_type, DATE(date_time) AS date FROM security_camera_footage WHERE captured_image IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT event_type FROM security_camera_footage ORDER BY event_type ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 1 ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) AS num_events FROM security_camera_footage GROUP BY event_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY num_events DESC;
SELECT camera_id, COUNT(DISTINCT date(date_time)) AS num_days FROM security_camera_footage GROUP BY camera_id ORDER BY num_days DESC;
SELECT captured_image FROM security_camera_footage WHERE event_type = 'motion_detected' AND date_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT footage_id, event_type, date_time FROM security_camera_footage ORDER BY footage_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM security_camera_metadata;
SELECT id, event_type FROM security_camera_metadata WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT event_type, timestamp FROM security_camera_metadata ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM recorded_events WHERE event_id = 3;
SELECT camera_id, event_description FROM recorded_events WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_camera_metadata WHERE camera_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) FROM security_camera_metadata GROUP BY event_type;
SELECT camera_id, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM recorded_events WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' GROUP BY camera_id;
SELECT camera_id, TIMESTAMP, event_description FROM recorded_events WHERE camera_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY camera_id ASC, TIMESTAMP DESC;
SELECT camera_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_event FROM recorded_events GROUP BY camera_id ORDER BY latest_event DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage;
SELECT camera_location, event_type, recording_timestamp FROM security_camera_footage WHERE event_type = 'Vandalism';
SELECT footage_id, camera_location, recording_timestamp FROM security_camera_footage ORDER BY recording_timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_name, installation_date FROM camera_location_info WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM event_log WHERE event_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage;
SELECT footage_id, camera_location, recording_timestamp FROM security_camera_footage ORDER BY recording_timestamp DESC;
SELECT camera_location, event_type, recording_timestamp FROM security_camera_footage WHERE event_type='motion_detected' AND camera_location LIKE 'Hall%';
SELECT f.camera_location, l.location_name, l.installation_date FROM security_camera_footage f JOIN camera_location_info l ON f.camera_location = l.location_name;
SELECT e.log_id, e.event_timestamp, e.event_type, f.camera_location FROM event_log e JOIN security_camera_footage f ON e.footage_id = f.footage_id ORDER BY e.event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityCameras;
SELECT location, resolution FROM SecurityCameras ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM FootageLogs WHERE event_type='motion';
SELECT camera_id, timestamp, description FROM FootageLogs ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result FROM EventAnalysis WHERE analysis_date='2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SecurityCameras WHERE location = 'Entrance'
SELECT location, resolution FROM SecurityCameras WHERE resolution = '1080p' ORDER BY camera_id DESC
SELECT camera_id, location FROM SecurityCameras WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM FootageLogs JOIN SecurityCameras ON FootageLogs.camera_id = SecurityCameras.camera_id
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_start_time, schedule_end_time FROM CameraSchedules WHERE schedule_start_time < '12:00:00'
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage
SELECT footage_url, timestamp, event_type FROM security_camera_footage
SELECT location_name, location_coordinates FROM camera_locations
SELECT camera_id, resolution, framerate, status FROM camera_settings
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM event_types
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT camera_id, event_type, timestamp FROM security_camera_footage WHERE event_type = 'Motion Detection'
SELECT camera_id, location_name, location_coordinates FROM camera_locations
SELECT e.log_id, e.event_description, c.location_name FROM event_logs e JOIN camera_locations c ON e.camera_id = c.camera_id
SELECT camera_id, resolution, framerate, status FROM camera_settings
